short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes footnote font to Times New Roman for easier copy and paste

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes NoodleTools footnote generator font to Times New Roman so it doesn't mess up Chicago Paper footnote font when pasting into Google Docs (just saves a little bit of time with changing the font)
